Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Volt Absorb 8 Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
1 Illuminate 5 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
18 Weak Armor 4 Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
36 Gooey 6 Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
54 Sticky Hold 4 Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
72 Natural Cure 7 All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.
90 Teravolt 9 Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
100 Lifelink 7 The Pokémon may restore some of its HP after making contact.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 02 Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Disc 07 Illuminate 5 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 16 Lifelink 7 The Pokémon may restore some of its HP after making contact.
Disc 36 Quark Drive 3 Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain.
Disc 43 Sand Veil 3 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.
Disc 49 Cecity -3 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Effect Spore 7 Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
Frisk 5 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
Galvanize 8 Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Gooey 6 Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
Healer 2 Sometimes heals an ally's status condition.
Insomnia 5 The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot fall asleep.
Lightning Rod 7 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Minus 1 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
Natural Cure 7 All status conditions heal when the Pokémon switches out.
Plus 1 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
Power Of Alchemy 1 The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
Protosynthesis 3 Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or solar wind.
Sand Force 7 Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
Shed Skin 8 The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.
Shell Armor 2 A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Solar Power 4 Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight or Solar Wind, but HP decreases every turn.
Stamina 7 Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
Static 5 The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so contact with it may cause paralysis.
Sticky Hold 4 Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
Synchronize 5 The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts one to the Pokémon.
Teravolt 9 Moves can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.
Transistor 4 Powers up Electric-type moves.
Triage 7 Gives priority to a healing move.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unnerve 4 Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
Volt Absorb 8 Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
Weak Armor 4 Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
